Package com.efecte.postit.service.impl

Class NotesServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.efecte.postit.service.impl.NotesServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
NotesService
@Service public class NotesServiceImpl extends Object implements NotesService
NotesServiceImpl to implement the CRUD operation required for a Post (Note)
